message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at $200. I believe it's a great deal for the value it provides. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay that price, which is the maximum I'm willing to go.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $200 is my initial asking price, I could come down to $170.  I'm confident you won't find this product at this price anywhere else.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to pay that price, which is the maximum I'm willing to go.
